languages.text: "Стая Торбальда Железношкурого сейчас осаждает Ефрат-II. Даже если моя стая не с ним, он может знать, где они охотятся. Я должен встретиться с Торбальдом и спросить его о своих братьях".
"The pack of Thorbald Ironhide is now laying siege to Eufrates II. Even if my pack is not with him, he may know where they are hunting. I must meet with Thorbald and ask after my brothers."
languages.original_text: "Стая Торбальда Железношкурого сейчас осаждает Ефрат-II. Даже если моя стая не с ним, он может знать, где они охотятся. Я должен встретиться с Торбальдом и спросить его о своих братьях".

traits.locale_text: "The pack of Thorbald Ironhide is now laying siege to Eufrates II. Even if my pack is not with him, he may know where they are hunting. I must meet with Thorbald and ask after my brothers."
"The pack of Thorbald Ironhide is now laying siege to Eufrates II. Even if my pack is not with him, he may know where they are hunting. I must meet with Thorbald and ask after my brothers."
"The pack of Thorbald Ironhide is now laying siege to Eufrates II. Even if my pack is not with him, he may know where they are hunting. I must meet with Thorbald and ask after my brothers."
"The pack of Thorbald Ironhide is now laying siege to Eufrates II. Even if my pack is not with him, he may know where they are hunting. I must meet with Thorbald and ask after my brothers."

languages.text: «La jauría de Thorbald Piel de Hierro está asediando Eufrates II. Aunque mi jauría no esté con él, es probable que sepa dónde están cazando. Debo reunirme con Thorbald para preguntarle por mis hermanos».
languages.original_text: "The pack of Thorbald Ironhide is now laying siege to Eufrates II. Even if my pack is not with him, he may know where they are hunting. I must meet with Thorbald and ask after my brothers."

traits.locale_text: «La jauría de Thorbald Piel de Hierro está asediando Eufrates II. Aunque mi jauría no esté con él, es probable que sepa dónde están cazando. Debo reunirme con Thorbald para preguntarle por mis hermanos».

languages.text: “索巴德·铁皮的狼群正在围攻欧夫拉茨二号星。即便我的狼群不在他身边，他也很可能知道他们在哪里狩猎。我必须去见索巴德一面，问问我的兄弟们在哪。”
languages.original_text: "The pack of Thorbald Ironhide is now laying siege to Eufrates II. Even if my pack is not with him, he may know where they are hunting. I must meet with Thorbald and ask after my brothers."

traits.locale_text: “索巴德·铁皮的狼群正在围攻欧夫拉茨二号星。即便我的狼群不在他身边，他也很可能知道他们在哪里狩猎。我必须去见索巴德一面，问问我的兄弟们在哪。”

languages.text: 「トールバルド・アイアンハイドの群れは現在、ユーフラテス・IIを包囲している。たとえ俺の群れが彼の元にいないとしても、トールバルドなら彼らがどこで狩りをしているかを知っているかもしれない。俺はトールバルドに会って兄弟たちのその後を尋ねなければならないんだ」
languages.original_text: "The pack of Thorbald Ironhide is now laying siege to Eufrates II. Even if my pack is not with him, he may know where they are hunting. I must meet with Thorbald and ask after my brothers."

traits.locale_text: 「トールバルド・アイアンハイドの群れは現在、ユーフラテス・IIを包囲している。たとえ俺の群れが彼の元にいないとしても、トールバルドなら彼らがどこで狩りをしているかを知っているかもしれない。俺はトールバルドに会って兄弟たちのその後を尋ねなければならないんだ」

languages.text: « La meute de Thorbald Peau-de-Fer assiège Euphrate-II en ce moment même. Si les miens ne sont pas avec lui, il saura peut-être où ils chassent actuellement. Je dois aller le voir afin de m'enquérir de mes frères. »
languages.original_text: "The pack of Thorbald Ironhide is now laying siege to Eufrates II. Even if my pack is not with him, he may know where they are hunting. I must meet with Thorbald and ask after my brothers."

traits.locale_text: « La meute de Thorbald Peau-de-Fer assiège Euphrate-II en ce moment même. Si les miens ne sont pas avec lui, il saura peut-être où ils chassent actuellement. Je dois aller le voir afin de m'enquérir de mes frères. »

languages.text: "Das Rudel von Thorbald Eisenhaut belagert nun Eufrates II. Selbst, wenn mein Rudel nicht bei ihm ist, weiß er vielleicht, wo sie jagen. Ich muss mich mit Thorbald treffen und nach meinen Brüdern fragen."
languages.original_text: "The pack of Thorbald Ironhide is now laying siege to Eufrates II. Even if my pack is not with him, he may know where they are hunting. I must meet with Thorbald and ask after my brothers."

traits.locale_text: "Das Rudel von Thorbald Eisenhaut belagert nun Eufrates II. Selbst, wenn mein Rudel nicht bei ihm ist, weiß er vielleicht, wo sie jagen. Ich muss mich mit Thorbald treffen und nach meinen Brüdern fragen."

languages.original_text: "The pack of Thorbald Ironhide is now laying siege to Eufrates II. Even if my pack is not with him, he may know where they are hunting. I must meet with Thorbald and ask after my brothers."

languages.text: "Thorbald Demirpost'un sürüsü şu an Eufrates II'yi kuşatıyor. Sürüm onunla beraber olmasa bile nerede avlandıklarını biliyor olabilir. Thorbald'la görüşüp kardeşlerimi sormam gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: "The pack of Thorbald Ironhide is now laying siege to Eufrates II. Even if my pack is not with him, he may know where they are hunting. I must meet with Thorbald and ask after my brothers."

traits.locale_text: "Thorbald Demirpost'un sürüsü şu an Eufrates II'yi kuşatıyor. Sürüm onunla beraber olmasa bile onların nerede avlandığını biliyor olabilir. Thorbald'la görüşüp kardeşlerimi ona sormam gerekiyor."
